message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product at a price of $9,500. It's a great deal for a product worth $10,000 to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I'd like to get closer to the product's worth to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still aiming for a slightly higher price.  I'm willing to come down to $9,000. This reflects the value of the product and gives us both a good deal. Let's make this happen!
I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. How about $8,750?
